info.name: Urlbar Identity-box label - Styled!!! - Fx 14+
info.description:
For Firefox 14+ and latest Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds.

This styles the Urlbar Identity-box label to make it look more similar to the Identity-box appearance before the new Urlbar Identity block design for Firefox 6 landed due to Bug 634065.

Works well with "LeftSideStar" extension:
https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/leftsidestar/ 
and style:
style 51379

Style for "LeftSideStar" Bookmark Star without Identity-Box Styling found here:
style 46915

Tested on Firefox 14+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora and Nightly builds.

Modified code from:

user 27093

To customize or fix Firefox Beta, Aurora, and Nightly builds, you can also have a look at my other styles: user 61655
info.additionalInfo:
Updated 03-08-2013
Now only compatible with Firefox 14+ and up to the latest Firefox Beta, Aurora and Nightly builds.

Updated 07-16-2012
Fixed an compatibility issue with Fx 14+ and newer builds when using the latest [Ext]Status-4-Evar Version 2012.07.08.17. 

Updated 06-09-2012
Adjusted the Identity-box label text color.

Updated 04-30-2012
Fixed an issue with the Identity-box label left margin...

Updated 04-03-2012
Fixed the URL/Hover URL alignment issue with [Ext]Status-4-Evar when using it's setting 'show links' in 'Location bar/Status alignment - Left or Right or Fixed' when using [Ext]LeftSideStar.

Updated 03-29-2012
Introduced new styling to the [Ext] LeftSideStar Bookmark Star and the Urlbar Notification Icons and removed support for extension version LeftSideStar 1.2.

Updated 03-08-2012
Due to Bug 732915 - Reduce the URL and search bar border radii

Updated 12-25-2011

https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/omnibar/versions/

Updated 09-25-2011

Updated 09-19-2011
